content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1564989502976{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”mobile-padding”][vc_column_text]

Hi, I’m Johannah Barton – Founder Confetti Design

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1521193315951{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

At Confetti Design  we believe that beautiful, high-converting websites and brands should not cost the earth. Starting a small business or re-branding can be overwhelming.  We are committed to adding value every step of the way with business development support and access to a hand-picked team of creative minds, that takes the stress away and saves you time and money.

For more than 10 years, I worked with large organisations taking their brand and translating that into a corporate wardrobe. In this role I worked with Creative Agencies to develop direct marketing plans, including catalogues and websites. Now with a team of designers and website developers I bring that big brand strategic thinking and expertise to benefit small business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Here’s how we can help

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1521193451175{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 2% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

We personally consult with our customers to unearth their inner business ambitions, detailing what success looks like to them.

We believe that if you start things right, you’ll set your business up for success. We help get you there with a thought-provoking, unique-to-us Clarity Process. A very thorough research experience unlike any other.  Our process will transform the way you view your purpose, your values and your customers. And quickly get to the heart of who you are for an iron-clad brand and message.

As a designer, this is the key enabling us to communicate your business purpose and offering while carving out your competitive advantage.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Here’s a little about me

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515638497522{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

I grew up surrounded by artists, fashion designers, modern dancers, musicians and chefs, all living and breathing their craft. It was an incredible environment for developing my design eye and skills.

Fashion and interior styling, marketing and business development have all been a part of my working life. Add to that, qualifications in Business, Information Systems Management, Direct Marketing, Italian, Training, Interior Design, Graphic Design and Photography and you may get the sense I like to learn and I have a unique balance of left and right brain skills.

Ultimately I now get to use all these experiences and skills in helping you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px” el_class=”mobile-space”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″] Ready to talk? We can give you an instant quote. [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″] View Our Work [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1565065915507{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1499608095407{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Some nice words from happy customers

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1517187783513{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”]

Personal Brand Expert

You want to engage Johannah as the woman who understands the complexities of building powerful brands and web sites that have impact. She also openly shares her extended network of like-minded professionals and experts in their field. to help you.

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

Johannah has a lovely, calm, insightful approach in taking your vision and transforming it into a beautiful site.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah's service is second to none and she responded within minutes to each of my requests or calls for help. I would highly recommend Confetti Design

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

What's My Style

Johannah understands small business and their needs, making the start-up journey and challenges easier. Being genuine and truly lovely is a bonus.

Nicky McMillan

Eat Drink Innovate

Confetti Design briefing process helped me to dive deep into my business & helped clarify what I really wanted to communicate via my brand.

Susie White

Moxo Living

Johannah is a delight to work with. She was always fully engaged with the issue at hand and always offered additional tips and guidance along the way.

Corinne De Castro Basto
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1564989926415{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”mobile-padding”]

As seen in ...

We are part of a large number of small business networks and have both contributed articles about small business websites and branding.

[vc_empty_space]
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1499608110427{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10224″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10225″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10226″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10227″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10228″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10229″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
